item.title: Sen. Kaine Defends Vindman Against Musk's 'Treason' Label
item.description: Sen. Tim Kaine, D-Va., has defended retired Army Lt. Col Alexander Vindman from the "treason" allegation leveled at him by Telsa CEO Elon Musk.
